default.title: 360° CUSTOMIZABLE
default.heading: Have full control over your online store
default.paragraph: Take total control of your eCommerce business by owning the source code and data that drive it.

textarea.placeholder: Tell us in detail what's going on

about.heading: The platform commerce is built on.
about.paragraph: Millions of the world's most successful brands trust Sirmyt to sell, ship and process payments anywhere.
about.altImage: A screenshot showing a piece of the platform

footer.heading: We can take care of the installation
footer.paragraph: Don’t want to deal with technical stuff? Let us fire up Uvodo for you, so you can spend your time selling right away.

payment.heading: Managing your ecommerce business on the go is easy.
payment.paragraph: Our customers enjoy complete freedom of doing business online by managing every aspect of their online store from their mobile and web devices.

platformView.altImage: An image showing a graph, an armchair and a screenshot for our platform

first.title: PWA READY STOREFRONT

first.paragraph: Build your dream business. Never worry about paying monthly fees or recurring payments again.
first.altImage: An imagem showing a list of three men with their respective data an a card showing amount bill

second.title: PAY ONCE, USE LIFETIME
second.heading: Getting your products sold on the easy.
